title: Zok , the sleeping dragon ( no stats added )
body:
Howdy people
just wanting to see if this character _Zok , the sleeping dragon _can possibly be an inspiration for a character.


Zok's passive: is a stack like ability where it makes his auto attacks make enemies drunk the drunken effect gives them more damage but gain a high miss chance the bonus damages will only be included in auto attacks but damage on abilities will be slightly lowered
q: is a fire bomb by using beer and well his breath
w: is a heal on the opponent but the opponent gains full stacks of drunk 
e: is a haze that slows and slowly gives drunk stacks
ult :is zok summoning the sleeping dragon and the dragon sends a noxious breath that makes the opponent drunk

so this is Zok, a drunken guy who will just make every enemy drunk so that they are gambling their chances to actually land an attack. All is how this concept will go and nothing else but it would be nice if this were to be a start of an inspiration of a new champion.

replies.body: " heal on the opponent" No, never, burn this concept, tell nobody, this can never see the light of day.

Well personally I reckon this is a good base for a champion. Loving the passive. Reckon would be the most fun champion to play. Would like to see a champion like this happen. Pretty sweet Idea :D gl.{{item:3113}}
